concise_definition: n. 锻炼, 练习, 训练; v. 锻炼, 练习, 行使

definitions.explanation_en: Physical activity performed to improve or maintain health, fitness, or strength, often through structured routines such as running, lifting weights, or yoga.
definitions.explanation_cn: 为改善或维持健康、体能或力量而进行的有组织的身体活动，如跑步、举重或瑜伽。
definitions.example_en: She does 30 minutes of exercise every morning to stay fit.
definitions.example_cn: 她每天早上锻炼30分钟以保持健康。

definitions.explanation_en: A task or set of tasks designed to practice or reinforce a skill, often used in education, music, or language learning.
definitions.explanation_cn: 为练习或巩固某项技能而设计的任务，常用于教育、音乐或语言学习中。
definitions.example_en: The students completed a grammar exercise before the test.
definitions.example_cn: 学生们在考试前完成了一项语法练习。

definitions.explanation_en: The use or application of a right, power, or ability, often in a formal or official context.
definitions.explanation_cn: 在正式或官方语境中对某项权利、权力或能力的行使或运用。
definitions.example_en: The president exercised his constitutional right to veto the bill.
definitions.example_cn: 总统行使了他否决该法案的宪法权利。

definitions.explanation_en: To engage in physical activity to maintain or improve health and fitness.
definitions.explanation_cn: 通过身体活动来维持或改善健康与体能。
definitions.example_en: He exercises regularly to reduce stress and improve his heart health.
definitions.example_cn: 他定期锻炼以减轻压力并改善心脏健康。

definitions.explanation_en: To practice or repeatedly perform a skill to gain proficiency or mastery.
definitions.explanation_cn: 通过反复练习以获得熟练或精通某项技能。
definitions.example_en: The pianist exercises her fingers with scales every day.
definitions.example_cn: 这位钢琴家每天用音阶练习手指。

definitions.explanation_en: To put into effect or make use of a right, power, or influence.
definitions.explanation_cn: 实施或运用某项权利、权力或影响力。
definitions.example_en: The manager exercised his authority to reassign the team.
definitions.example_cn: 经理行使了他的权力重新分配了团队。

comparison.analysis: “Workout” (锻炼) 是 “exercise” 的一个具体子集，通常指一次有计划的、高强度的健身活动，如健身房训练或团体课程。它更强调形式和时间长度，而 “exercise” 是更广泛的术语，可包括散步、爬楼梯等日常活动。
“Practice” (练习) 侧重于通过重复来提高技能，尤其在学习、艺术或专业领域，如练习钢琴或练习演讲。而 “exercise” 在技能训练语境中更强调结构化、有明确目标的训练任务，常用于教育或语言学习中。
“Drill” (操练) 指高度重复、机械性的训练，常用于军事、体育或语言学习中，目的是形成肌肉记忆或自动化反应。它比 “exercise” 更强调单调性和纪律性，而 “exercise” 的范围更广，可包含创造性或探索性活动。
